text: Niscayanga, maryam kumarudaina masih (kristu) ye allah!" Ani ane varu nis'sandehanga! Satya tiraskarulu. (O pravakta!) Varito ila anu: "Allah ganaka maryam kumarudaina masih (kristu) nu atani tallini mariyu bhumipai unna varandarini, nasanam ceyagorite, ayananu apagala sakti evariki undi? Mariyu akasalalonu, bhumilonu mariyu vati madhya unna samastam mida adhipatyam allah de. Ayana tanu korinadi srstistadu. Mariyu allah pratidi ceya gala samardhudu
